title: sys: unix has unimplemented stubs for some functions on Solaris
body:
The golang.org/x/sys/unix package has stubs for these functions but no actual implementation:

* Gethostname
* Pipe
* Wait4

As a result, if you attempt to use these functions in a Go program on Solaris, you'll get a build error, such as:
```
golang.org/x/sys/unix.Wait4: call to external function golang.org/x/sys/unix.wait4
golang.org/x/sys/unix.Wait4: golang.org/x/sys/unix.wait4: not defined
golang.org/x/sys/unix.Wait4: undefined: golang.org/x/sys/unix.wait4 
```

I will submit a CL soon that provides the missing implementations.
